overview: Dr. Joan Borysenko presents a path to inner peace through this yearlong series composed of 52 inspirational segments and stories of spirituality, science and humor. Through brief weekly lessons, Borysenko's self-discovery program teaches you the practical skills you need to live a more peaceful, centered life. A best-selling author and well-known speaker and consultant, Borysenko is president of Mind/Body Health Sciences Inc.
title: Inner Peace for Busy People
